rows.label: tlk001001_06_msg0001
rows.name:
I never thought the Pope would
pull a stunt like this...

rows.label: tlk001001_06_msg0002
rows.name:
I don't expect the Superbian Divine Beast
to last much longer now...

rows.label: tlk001001_06_msg0003
rows.name:
But I ask that you entrust the welfare
of the country to me.

rows.label: tlk001001_06_msg0004
rows.name:
You have your own roles to play in
all this. Do what you have to do.

rows.label: tlk001001_06_msg0005
rows.name:
The future of Superbia, and indeed
the whole of Alst, lies in your hands.
